prodNameC: 伯樂亞 細胞巨大性病毒 免疫球蛋白M
ingredientsDesc:
MT PLATE: 12 x 8 wells coated with anti-human IgM monoclonal antibodies.
CONTROL + :
Diluted human serum (containing anti-CMV IgM antibodies) in Phosphate buffer
0.01 mol/L with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%, liquid, ready for use without further
dilution.
CONTROL CUT OFF :
Diluted human serum (containing anti-CMV IgM antibodies) in Phosphate buffer
0.01 mol/L with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%, liquid, ready for use without further
dilution.
Ag :
Partially purified Cytomegalovirus, inactivated by treatment with Betapropiolactone,
in Phosphate buffer containing mouse ascitic fluid and lactose.
CONJ :
monoclonal antibodies labelled with peroxidase, in phosphate buffer with phenol
0.05% and Bronidox 0.02%.
The immunocomplex should be prepared about 45 min. before use.
CONTROL IgM :
Diluted human serum in Phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/L with BSA 1% and sodium
azide 0.09%, liquid, ready for use without further dilution.
WASH BUF 10x :
Phosphate buffered saline, concentrated 10 times; contains Brij
applicantName: 美商伯瑞股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路4段126號14樓
efficacy: 對人類血清中以酵素免疫法定性測定對抗細胞巨大性病毒的免疫球蛋白M。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3175 巨細胞病毒血清試劑
